test-case.name: treat-as-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression where dynamic type does not match expected type.

test-case.name: treat-as-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:string data type and a function that expects a string.

test-case.name: treat-as-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:integer data type and a div expression.

test-case.name: treat-as-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:decimal data type and a function that can take an decimal/integer (integer treated as decimal).

test-case.name: treat-as-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:decimal data type and a function that can take a decimal/integer (decimal treated as integer).

test-case.name: treat-as-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:float data type and a function that can take a float (fn:abs).

test-case.name: treat-as-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:double data type and a function that can take a double (fn:abs).

test-case.name: treat-as-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:boolean data type and a function that can take a boolean (fn:not).

test-case.name: treat-as-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:date data type and a function that can take a date (fn:year-from-date).

test-case.name: treat-as-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:dateTime data type and a function that can take a dateTime (fn:minutes-from-dateTime).

test-case.name: treat-as-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:time data type and a function that can take a time (fn:hours-from-time).

test-case.name: treat-as-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:integer data type and a homogeneous sequence.

test-case.name: treat-as-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression involving the xs:integer data type and a heterogeneous sequence.

test-case.name: treat-as-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and integer/float data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-15
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and integer/double data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and float/integer data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and double/integer data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and double/float data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and float/double data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and decimal/double data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and decimal/float data types.

test-case.name: treat-as-22
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and float/decimal data types (float cast as decimal treat as decimal).

test-case.name: treat-as-23
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression with a "cast as" expression and double/decimal data types (double cast as decimal treat as decimal).

test-case.name: treat-as-24
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression used as part of an addition operation.

test-case.name: treat-as-25
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of treat as expression used as part of a subtraction operation.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `3 treat as xs:string`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:double("3") treat as xs:float`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:anyURI("example.com/") treat as xs:float`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `3.0 treat as xs:integer`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:integer(3) treat as xs:decimal instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `"3" treat as xs:string eq '3'`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `xs:integer("3") treat as xs:decimal instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-8
test-case.description: A type is specified which doesn't exist.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-9
test-case.description: A type is specified which doesn't exist.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-10
test-case.description: Exactly-one xs:integer does not match empty-sequence().

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-11
test-case.description: Implementations using the static typing feature, may raise XPTY0004 because one of the operands to operator 'eq' has cardinality 'one-or-more'.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-12
test-case.description: Implementations using the static typing feature, may raise XPTY0004 because one of the operands to operator 'eq' has cardinality 'zero-or-more'.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-13
test-case.description: Implementations using the static typing feature, may raise XPTY0004 because one of the operands to the multiply-operator has cardinality 'zero-or-more'.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(3 treat as xs:integer ? * 3) eq 9`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-15
test-case.description: A complex 'treat as' expression, stressing parser and evaluation logic. Implementations supporting the static typing feature may issue XPTY0004.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-16
test-case.description: '3 treat as item(' is a syntatically invalid expression.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqExprTreat-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(remove((5, 1e0), 2) treat as xs:integer) eq 5`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-SeqExprTreat-1
test-case.description: An xs:decimal, despite being a valid integer, cannot be treated as an xs:integer.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-SeqExprTreat-2
test-case.description: Use three pluses on a row, combined with 'treat as'.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-SeqExprTreat-3
test-case.description: Lhs must be a StepExpr, and TreatExpr is not.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-SeqExprTreat-4
test-case.description: Treat the result of an empty node test, as the empty-sequence().
